content: अद्भुत {%<ab>a.</ab>%} [<ls>Uṇ. 5. 1</ls> अदि भुवो डुतच्; according to <ls>Nir.</ls> न भूतं ‘the like of which did not take place before.] {@--1@} Wonderful, marvellous; °कर्मन् of wonderful deeds; °गंध having wonderful smell; °दर्शन, °रूप; prodigious, extraordinary, transcendental, supernatural. {@--2@} <ab>Ved.</ab> Unobserved, invisible (<ab>opp.</ab> दृश्य). --तं {@--1@} A wonder; a wonderful thing or occurrence, a prodigy, miracle; देव अद्भुतं खलु संवृत्तं <ls>Ś. 5</ls> a wonderful or unexpected occurrence; अकालिकमनध्यायं विद्यात्सर्वाद्भुतेषु च <ls>Ms. 4. 118.</ls> {@--2@} Surprise, astonishment, wonder ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}) also; °उद्भ्रांतदेवासुराणि विक्रांतचरितानि <ls>U. 6</ls> lost in wonder. --तः {@--1@} One of the 8 or {9} {%Rasas%}, the marvellous sentiment; जगति जनितात्यद्भुतरसः <ls>U. 3. 44.</ls> {@--2@} <ab>N.</ab> of the Indra of the 9th Manvantara.
